property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, search your deck. You may take a non-creature card that costs 6 or less, show that card to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck, then use that card from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, search your deck. You may take a non-creature card that costs 6 or less, show that card to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck, then use that card from your hand for no cost.

Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 6 or more Dragons in your graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Infinity Power Attacker (While attacking, this creature has infinite power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 6 or more Dragons in your graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Infinity Power Attacker (While attacking, this creature has infinite power.)

Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Chain Cascade (When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are creatures that cost less than this creature, you may put them into the battle zone. Put the rest of the cards on top of your deck in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each player puts all their cards in the battle zone, hand, shield zone and graveyard into their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that cost 3 or less get "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's evolution creatures and creatures that have "speed attacker" are put into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone for no cost, put that creature into its owner's mana zone. ■ When this creature would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle this card and your graveyard into your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have an Angel Command Dragon in the battle zone you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Each player puts all their creatures that cost the same as or more than the number of cards in their mana zones on the bottom of their decks in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a creature, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it's tapped. ■ Mana Arms 5: While battling, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +13000 power.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If there are Gods among these cards that are able to link with one of your Gods in the battle zone, you may put those Gods into the battle zone and link it with that God.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this card into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ Whenever this creature battles, your opponent's creature gets -4000 power until the end of the battle. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Dragon, put it into your hand. If it's not a Dragon, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. (Dragonoids don't count.) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Giants may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. {SAVER}: Giant (When one of your Giant(s) would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put any number of cards from your hand into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a creature that has "Bolmeteus" in its name, you may choose both: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less and destroy it: ► Tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone, and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may put it into your mana zone. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose one of the following: ► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, you may have the first light creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, you may have the first water creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, you may have the first darkness creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, you may have the first fire creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 9 or less.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this spell gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: Instead of the top card of your deck, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent summons a creature or casts a spell, draw 2 cards. ■ Your opponent can't summon creatures that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent summons a creature or casts a spell, draw 2 cards. ■ Your opponent can't summon creatures that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts it into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts it into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.
